synopsis.p: Writes the corpus data structure as a JSON file.

description.p: evaluates files as a list of elements with the corpus as the context element and creates a file for each result. The file is located in outDir and named after the result of fileName (evaluated as a string).
If corpusFile is set, then it overrides files and fileName. The whole corpus goes into a single file.
Each file is a JSON file with a structure specified by json.

param-doc.name: files
param-doc.p: Expression that specifies which element corresponds to each file.

param-doc.name: corpusFile
param-doc.p: Path to a single file for the whole corpus. This parameter will override both files and fileName.
